name: Athena Cykes: Ace Attorney - Trials of time.
summary: Two years after what happened in Khura'in, Athena Cykes - an attorney, encounters a bunch of strange cases, with her ex co-worker: Apollo, being in Khura'in, and her boss - Phoenix Wright's sudden dissapearance, she has to solve the cases on her own, discover all the mysteries, and find out how they are all connected. And also find her boss. Will she do it? I don't know, that's for you to find out.
